sub_fields.label: Link Type
sub_fields.name: link_type
sub_fields.instructions: Click to use custom URL. The default type is set to Page.

sub_fields.label: Sizing
sub_fields.name: sizing
sub_fields.instructions: Determines how the Width & Height fields are used to resize the image.

sub_fields.label: Height
sub_fields.name: height
sub_fields.instructions: Leave blank to use automatic height.

sub_fields.label: Open In New Window
sub_fields.name: open_in_new_window
sub_fields.message: Check the box to open the link in a new window.

sub_fields.label: Allow External Links
sub_fields.name: allow_external_links
sub_fields.instructions: Check to use a copy/paste custom URL. Will overwrite Link Type if this option is set.

sub_fields.label: Alignment
sub_fields.name: alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Use to set the horizontal alignment of the button. It is centered by default.

sub_fields.label: Link Type
sub_fields.name: link_type
sub_fields.instructions: Check to change the link type to category. The default is set to page. Will be overridden by Allow External Links if that option is set.

sub_fields.label: Open In New Window
sub_fields.name: open_new_window
sub_fields.instructions: Check the box to open the link in a new window.

sub_fields.label: Allow External Links
sub_fields.name: allow_external_links
sub_fields.instructions: Check to use a copy/paste custom URL. Will overwrite Link Type if this option is set.
